article_title: UK Nurse Suffering From Ebola In Critical Condition
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: uk, nurse, suffering, ebola, critical, condition, hospital

og.description: A British nurse being treated in a London hospital for Ebola is in critical condition. She is Britain's first case of the deadly disease.
